bug.author: xiaobin1231
bug.summary: I train yolov3 from scratch with input size(416) and darknet.conv.74, but I can't achieve your reported results(mAp0.5 55.4).Is it because I didn't use multi-scale training.My result is 54.4 mAp0.5.
